title: Manage Stellar account
desc:
Fast access to your Stellar account. Discover new tokens 
 and market pairs, place orders and send funds using memorable addresses in just a few clicks.

title: Hardware and multisig wallets
desc:
Keep your crypto assets safe and protected. 
 StellarTerm features full support of Ledger hardware wallets 
 and multisignature Stellar accounts.

title: Advanced trading features
desc: Trade hundreds of market pairs on SDEX in real-time. View live stats and prices, seamlessly switch markets, manage and edit live offers.

title: Desktop apps
desc: If you prefer a desktop experience, we offer desktop apps for macOS, Windows and Linux. For extra security, you can use Github to build from the source.
